app Module¶

This module provides a Streamlit application for retrieving and exporting user data from Account Manager.

Classes¶

StreamlitApp Class¶

class your_module.app.StreamlitApp¶

A Streamlit application that provides an interface for users to retrieve Account Manager users and offers a download button for an Excel file containing the user data.

Attributes:

  • am_users_exporter (AccountManagerUsersExporter): An instance responsible for exporting user data to an Excel file.

Methods:

  • __init__()

  • run()

  • display_download_button()

Initialization:

You can initialize an instance of the StreamlitApp class by providing an instance of the AccountManagerUsersExporter class.

am_users_exporter = AccountManagerUsersExporter()
app = StreamlitApp(am_users_exporter)

Running the Application:

The run() method executes the Streamlit app. It displays a button to fetch and download user data.

app.run()

Displaying the Download Button:

The display_download_button() method displays a download button for the Excel file if it exists.

app.display_download_button()

Important

Make sure to run the Streamlit application within the if __name__ == "__main__": block.

Account Manager users exporter
